Name: 2D Brick Breaker Game | REMASTERED
About the game: 2D Brick Breaker Game | REMASTERED is a relaxing/casual retro game where you shoot balls and break the variously colored bricks. There are also a lot of different powerups to make the game more immersive. The game has 100 unique levels. Play the game on the side while watching your favorite videos. 100 levels of brick breaking fun. 6 different powerups. Just relax and keep breaking.
